author: fwyzard
body:
Open MPI v2.1.5 is a critical bug fix release, and is likely the last release in the v2.1.x series.
Open MPI v2.1.5 is only recommended for those who are still running Open MPI v2.0.x or v2.1.x.

Enable support for multithreading in OpenMPI.

Include Boost.MPI:
  - add a dependency on OpenMPI
  - build boost with MPI support
  - add a new boost_mpi tool
title: Update OpenMPI to version 2.1.5 (critical bugfix release) (10.2.x backport)
